useful_title: Understanding Aging Degeneration, Regeneration, and the Scientific Search for the Fountain of Youth
best_gem_comment: If you want to learn about how to read a scientific paper and also about leading research in aging biology, take this course! There is really not too much work – the psets are pretty short and the exams are (relatively) low stress. However just because there isn’t that much work doesn’t mean that its a gem – the PSETs are graded pretty hard. The course casts a pretty wide net and you will go through information very fast, but there is always time to focus in on something specific that you are interested in for the final project or on certain PSET questions.  The content can also be pretty hard to understand sometimes, but I feel like I’ve gotten a really good overview of the entire aging biology field.
best_gem_comment_short: However just because there isn’t that much work doesn’t mean that its a gem – the PSETs are graded pretty hard.
